official_title: A bill entitled, "The Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1987".
short_title: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1987

summary.text: Battle Mountain Pasture Restoration Act of 1987 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Battle Mountain Community Pasture, Lander County, Nevada, to the Pershing County Water Conservation District.
